statement: Only poor hygiene causes vaginal infections.
truth: Infections can be caused by hormonal changes, tight clothing, or even stress.

statement: You should wash the intimate area with regular soap.
truth: Regular soaps can disrupt pH balance; use mild, pH-balanced products instead.

statement: Intimate area needs to smell like flowers or perfume.
truth: Vaginas have a natural scent—fragrance-loaded products can be harmful.

statement: Discharge always indicates infection.

statement: Itching in the intimate area is always due to STIs.

statement: It's okay to scrub the intimate area hard while bathing.

statement: Hormonal changes during periods or menopause can cause dryness.

statement: All vaginal infections are the same.
